testcase.name: TC16 Kullanici wait islemlerinin calistigini test eder
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "herokuUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed Then Herokuapp Add Element butonuna basar...................................passed And Herokuapp Delete butonu gorunmesini bekler..............................passed And Herokuapp Delete butonunun gorunur oldugunu test eder...................passed Then Herokuapp Delete butonuna basarak butonu siler.........................passed And Herokuapp Delete butonunun gorunmedigini test eder......................passed Then Sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed
